/* Structure for courses */
function Course(code, name, desc, cred, excl, term,
                preq, creq, preqs, creqs, dreqs) {
    this.code = code;
    this.name = name;
    this.desc = desc;
    this.cred = cred;
    this.excl = excl;
    this.term = term;
    this.preq = preq;
    this.creq = creq;
    this.preqs = preqs;
    this.creqs = creqs;
    this.dreqs = dreqs;
}
